name: Disable Right Click and Content Copy Protection
author: Meet Makadia

sections.description:
[Disable Right Click and Content Copy Protection] is a free wordpress plugin. It gives users the ability to prevent right Click on wordpress site.The plugin is lightweight. Use it and Enjoy.

But when Administrator or Site Editor is logged in, he can access everything without any of the above restrictions.

NOTE: Please do clear or purge website cache.
sections.installation:
1. Go to the Add New plugins screen in your WordPress Dashboard
  2. Click the upload tab
  3. Browse for the plugin file (disable-right-click-and-content-copy-protection) on your computer
  4. Click \”Install Now\” and then hit the activate button.
sections.faq:
Can this plugin be used to prevent right click on wordpress site?

Yes.

Is this plugin paid or free?

This plugin is totally free.

Is this a plugin a lightweight plugin?

Yes.

Can I accept donations for this plugin?

Yes.

What about support?

Create a support ticket at WordPress forum and I will take care of any issue.
sections.changelog:
1.4

  • search and password input type fix

1.3

  • A keyboad key pressing event prevent.
  • fix minor bug.

Features

  • Disable Right Click.
  • Disable Text Selection.
  • Disable Image drag-n-drop.
  • This is the lightWeight plugin.
  • Easy to use in website.
  • Small and well written code plugin.
  • This is the stable version plugin.
  • Stop saving images with right click.
  • It dose not show any dialog message or popup after right click.
